translation.en: Hello?
-[man 1] Turn him over. -[man 2] Is he alive?
[woman] Can you hear me?
Hey. Where are you? I've been calling for an hour.
translation.de: Wo bist du? Ich rufe seit einer Stunde an.

translation.en: Lorna, you're not my wife anymore.
Thanks for that, Mick,
I still get confused. Some days, I think I am your wife.
translation.de: Manchmal denke ich, ich bin deine Frau.

translation.en: Others, I'm more like your mother.
Don't do that. Think I can't tell when you're holding the phone away?
translation.de: Hör auf. Ich merke, wenn du das Handy weghältst.

translation.en: What I am is a person who runs this practice,
translation.de: Ich bin diejenige, die diese Kanzlei leitet,

translation.en: what's left of it anyway,
and as such, I need to be able to reach you.
Okay, you reached me. What's the problem?
translation.de: Hast du ja jetzt. Was ist los?

translation.en: [Lorna] We got a call from Judge Holder.
-She wants to meet with you ASAP. -The Chief Judge?
Technically, the presiding judge. Tell me you're not sleeping with her.
translation.de: Eher die Vorsitzende. Sag mir, dass da nichts läuft.

translation.en: No. Why would you even say that?
translation.de: Nein. Wieso sagst du so was?

translation.en: The only reason you'd be called to the private chambers of a female judge
translation.de: Eine Richterin beruft dich nur in ihre Kammer,

translation.en: is, A, you have a case before her, or B, you have a personal relationship.
translation.de: wenn sie deinen Fall verhandelt oder du was mit ihr hast.

translation.en: And since you haven't had any cases for a year…
translation.de: Da du ein Jahr keinen Fall hattest…

translation.en: I never even met the woman.
-She wants to meet with you now. -But she didn't say what it was about?
translation.de: -Du sollst sofort zu ihr kommen. -Nannte sie einen Grund?

translation.en: No. But can we please allow for the possibility
translation.de: Nein, aber lass uns kurz in Betracht ziehen,

translation.en: this might be positive?
Maybe she wants to assign you a case pro bono.
translation.de: Womöglich sollst du pro bono arbeiten.

translation.en: -Work begets work. -Well, maybe.
Still here.
Drive one of the Lincolns.
They're in storage.
Get one out of storage. The Lincoln becomes you.
translation.de: Dann hol einen raus. Der Lincoln steht dir.

translation.en: And you become you.
Should this present as a real opportunity, you gotta go in there full Mickey Haller.
translation.de: Sollte das eine echte Chance sein, musst du alles geben, was du hast.

translation.en: All right.
You've got Hayley tonight. Just calling to remind.
translation.de: Du hast Hayley heute, nicht vergessen.

translation.en: 'Cause you think I'll forget?
Six o'clock, okay? Not 6:10. Not 6:05.
translation.de: 18 Uhr, ok? Nicht 18:10 Uhr oder 18:05 Uhr.

translation.en: Who's the lucky guy? Do I know him?
translation.de: Wer ist der Glückspilz? Kenne ich ihn?

translation.en: 6:00 p.m. sharp, Mickey.
[Mickey] I got it.
Hey, what can you tell me about Judge Mary Holder?
translation.de: Was weißt du über Richterin Mary Holder?

translation.en: Why?
I don't know. She called me to her chambers.
translation.de: Weiß nicht. Sie rief mich zu sich.

translation.en: -Did you do something? -No, I haven't done something.
Then why would she call you to chambers?
translation.de: Was will sie dann von dir?

translation.en: I don't know, which is why I'm asking. What can you tell me about her?
translation.de: Tja, darum frage ich ja. Was kannst du mir über sie sagen?

translation.en: She's got a bug up her ass the size of the legal canon of ethics,
translation.de: Sie geht bei jeder Kleinigkeit an die Decke.

translation.en: which makes me think you've done something.
-Thanks. -Wait, Mickey--
I'll see you tonight.
He's done something.
[Lorna] Oh, hello, Mick.
-Lorna. -I was driving this way anyway.
-No. You're checking up. -[Lorna] Says who?
You look good. I have always loved this one.
What are you doing here?
This could be a very big deal.
She's the presiding judge. So I came down to gather intel.
translation.de: Sie ist die vorsitzende Richterin. Ich sammelte Infos.

translation.en: And?
Most of her work is administrative, which judge goes where and so forth.
translation.de: Sie klärt Administratives, wie etwa die Richterzuteilung.

translation.en: [Mickey] And?
And… she assigns cases.
-If that's what this is about… -You don't want me to blow it.
translation.de: -Wenn sie das vorhat… -Soll ich's nicht versauen.

translation.en: I'm just saying, whatever this is, it has to go well. Okay?
translation.de: Was immer es ist, es muss gut laufen, ok?

translation.en: [Holder] Mr. Haller, I presume.
Judge Holder.
I don't believe we've met before.
No, Your Honor.
Well, come on then.
The Lincoln Lawyer, that what they call you?
Some do, yes.
Or did.
Why?
Mainly worked out of my car. Going from court to court.
translation.de: Ich arbeitete in meinem Auto. Fuhr von Gericht zu Gericht.

translation.en: All the driving and so forth.
Being ready to flee the jurisdiction if need be.
Never fled the jurisdiction.
translation.de: So was habe ich nie getan.

translation.en: Have a seat.
What's your relationship with Jerry Vincent?
translation.de: Wie stehen Sie zu Jerry Vincent?

translation.en: Uh, I used to go up against him back when he was a prosecutor.
translation.de: Wir waren Gegner vor Gericht, als er Staatsanwalt war.

translation.en: And he switched sides.
He was murdered last night.
Excuse me?
Shot dead in his car.
What?
If you were close, please accept my condolences,
but that's not why you're here.
translation.de: Aber darum sind Sie nicht hier.

translation.en: Were you close?
I mean, friendly. Colleagues, mostly.
translation.de: Wir hatten ein gutes Verhältnis. Wir waren Kollegen.

translation.en: He left you his practice.
I beg your pardon?
Mr. Vincent filed a motion with the court ten days ago
translation.de: Er beantragte vor zehn Tagen vor Gericht,

translation.en: that allowed for the transfer of his entire practice to you,
translation.de: dass seine Kanzlei auf Sie übertragen wird

translation.en: should he become incapacitated or deceased.
translation.de: im Falle von Berufsunfähigkeit oder Tod.

translation.en: -He never discussed this with you? -No.
translation.de: -Hat er das nie mit Ihnen besprochen? -Nein.

translation.en: Well, last night he became deceased, which means what was his is now yours.
translation.de: Letzte Nacht verstarb er, also übernehmen Sie seine Aufgaben.

translation.en: Including the Trevor Elliott trial.
You have heard of that?
The tech guy who killed his wife and her boyfriend.
translation.de: Ein IT-ler tötete seine Frau und ihren Lover.

translation.en: Allegedly.
Of course.
That's now my case?
They're all your cases, Mr. Haller.
translation.de: Sie bekommen alle Fälle, Mr. Haller,

translation.en: You might not get to keep them.
Every client has a right to move on to another attorney
translation.de: Die Klienten dürfen den Anwalt wechseln,

translation.en: once apprised of Mr. Vincent's demise.
translation.de: wenn Mr. Vincents Tod bekannt ist.

translation.en: What it does mean is you get first shot.
Assuming I'm satisfied that Mr. Vincent's clients
translation.de: Aber nur, wenn ich denke, Mr. Vincents Mandanten

translation.en: are being transferred to a replacement counsel
of good standing and competent skill.
As far as I can tell,
you haven't had any cases in quite some time.
translation.de: hatten Sie schon lange keine Gerichtsverfahren mehr.

translation.en: Yeah. [clears throat] I was in an accident about 18 months ago.
translation.de: Ja… Ich hatte einen Unfall. Vor etwa 18 Monaten.

translation.en: Surfing, if you can believe it.
I had multiple surgeries and, well, there were complications.
translation.de: Ich musste mich einigen OPs unterziehen, und es gab Komplikationen.

translation.en: Complications?
I took painkillers. Got addicted to 'em. But that's over now. I got help.
translation.de: Ich wurde tablettenabhängig. Aber das ist vorbei, nach einer Therapie.

translation.en: Got clean. So whatever concerns you may have about my reputation, I--
translation.de: Ich bin clean. Wenn Sie Sorgen wegen meines Rufs haben…

translation.en: It's my reputation I'm concerned about. I'm the one that has to sign off on you.
translation.de: Es geht um meinen Ruf. Ich muss Sie absegnen.

translation.en: Or not.
Why you?
Of all the lawyers out there.
Honestly, Your Honor, I have no idea.
translation.de: Ehrlich gesagt, Euer Ehren, keine Ahnung.

translation.en: Well, if you were to guess?
Well, as I said, Jerry and I were friendly,
translation.de: Jerry und ich verstanden uns gut,

translation.en: we trusted each other.
And second, though this is subjective,
when I am right, there's no better criminal defense attorney in Los Angeles
translation.de: Geht's mir gut, hat LA keinen besseren Strafverteidiger.

translation.en: and Jerry knew that from personal experience.
And you think you're right now?
I do.
This is an order
transferring Mr. Vincent's practice to you.
translation.de: überträgt Mr. Vincents Kanzlei an Sie.

translation.en: I can rescind it just as fast.
translation.de: Ich kann das auch wieder annullieren.

translation.en: I will be monitoring you, Mr. Haller.
I want an updated inventory of cases by the beginning of next week.
translation.de: Aktualisieren Sie das Verzeichnis bis Anfang nächster Woche.

translation.en: After that, a bi-weekly status update
of every case on which you will remain counsel.
translation.de: über die von Ihnen übernommenen Fälle.

translation.en: -Am I clear? -I won't let you down, Your Honor.
Don't let your clients down.
I suggest you get to Mr. Vincent's office right now.
translation.de: Fahren Sie direkt zu Mr. Vincents Kanzlei.

translation.en: The police are, no doubt, searching it
and probably invading their privacy as we speak.
translation.de: und verletzt dabei sicher den Datenschutz.

translation.en: Thank you, Your Honor.
Good luck, Mr. Haller.
Well, did you get a case?
I just got a lot of them.
Including Trevor Elliott.
What?
I need to meet the clients,
get their sign-offs, but I might be back, Lorna.
translation.de: müssen noch zustimmen, aber ich bin wohl zurück.

translation.en: I might actually be back.
What did I tell you about positive visualization?
translation.de: Siehst du, was positive Visualisierung bringt?

translation.en: You wake up, not a single client.
Now, you are repping a guy like Trevor Elliott in a murder trial.
translation.de: Und jetzt übernimmst du Trevor Elliotts Mordprozess.

translation.en: If he decides to keep me.
[Lorna] Positive thinking, Mickey. Positive thinking.
-Floor is closed, folks. -We have business on this floor.
translation.de: -Die Etage ist dicht. -Wir haben hier zu tun.

translation.en: -Not today, you don't. -Talk to the judge.
Need to see some ID.
You know, you don't help yourselves being dicky-do's.
translation.de: Sie tun sich damit keinen Gefallen.

translation.en: Just saying.
-Can I help you? -Mickey Haller. I'm an attorney.
I've taken over Mr. Vincent's practice.
You need to come back tomorrow. This is a crime scene. It's sealed off.
translation.de: Kommen Sie morgen wieder. Der Tatort ist abgesperrt.

translation.en: The crime scene was a parking garage, not this office.
translation.de: Der Tatort war die Tiefgarage, nicht diese Kanzlei.

translation.en: There are client files here I need to access and apparently safeguard.
translation.de: Ich muss auf Akten zugreifen und sie offenbar bewachen.

translation.en: What'd you say your name was?
Mickey Haller. This is Lorna Crane. She works with me.
translation.de: Mickey Haller. Lorna Crane, eine Kollegin.

translation.en: Well, Mickey Haller and Lorna Crane,
I need you to both leave. Now.
-Dicky-do's, I'm telling you. -What was that?
That wasn't meant for you. But if you heard me, you heard me.
translation.de: War nicht für Ihre Ohren bestimmt. Pech gehabt.

translation.en: You're contaminating a crime scene. You can't be here.
translation.de: Sie kontaminieren den Tatort. Gehen Sie.

translation.en: This order will confirm I've been appointed
by the presiding judge of the Superior Court
translation.de: dass mich die Vorsitzende des Kammergerichts

translation.en: as replacement counsel to Jerry Vincent's clients.
That means his cases are now my cases,
and you have no right to be in here looking through files.
translation.de: Sie haben kein Recht auf Akteneinsicht.

translation.en: That's attorney-client privilege.
Mr. Vincent's been murdered. The motive could be in one of these files.
translation.de: Das Mordmotiv könnte in einer dieser Akten stecken.

translation.en: -Even if that were the case-- -Counselor--
Just read the order, Detective.
Your crime scene is out in the garage
and no judge in LA would extend it to this office and these files.
translation.de: Kein Richter LAs würde Kanzlei und Akten freigeben.

translation.en: You say this gives you all of Mr. Vincent's cases?
translation.de: Ihnen wurden Mr. Vincents Fälle zugeteilt?

translation.en: That's right.
-Then that puts you on our list. -Come again.
Our suspect list.
He's dead and you get the whole business?
translation.de: Sie übernehmen nach seinem Tod seine Kanzlei?

translation.en: That's motive, ask me.
Care to tell us where you were last night between 8:00 and midnight?
translation.de: Wo waren Sie gestern zwischen 20 Uhr und Mitternacht?

translation.en: You got me, Detective. You got me.
I killed Jerry. Case closed, everybody.
translation.de: Ich habe Jerry getötet. Der Fall ist gelöst, Leute.

translation.en: Clearly you've done this before.
Are you gonna get out of here, or do I need to call the judge?
translation.de: Verschwinden Sie. Oder muss ich die Richterin anrufen?

translation.en: Yeah.
-Guys. -Nice to meet you, too.
-Bye. -[detective] Let's go.
Leave everything.
What?
All right. Come on.
[Lorna] Sometimes I think they teach it in the academy,
translation.de: Bei der Ausbildung lernen Polizisten wohl,

translation.en: how to piss people off.
When you think of all the bad blood between the people and police,
translation.de: Bei der miesen Stimmung zwischen Bürgern und Polizei

translation.en: you'd think "how not to piss people off" would be in the curriculum.
translation.de: möchte man meinen, Netiquette gehört in den Lehrplan.

translation.en: How would you feel about me hiring Cisco?
He's a good investigator. One of the best I've worked with.
translation.de: Er ist ein guter Ermittler. Einer der besten.

translation.en: Working with your ex-wife is one thing,
translation.de: Die Ex als Kollegin ist das Eine.

translation.en: hiring her boyfriend is pushing it, even for you.
translation.de: Ihren Freund anzuheuern, geht selbst für dich zu weit.

translation.en: If Trevor Elliott decides to keep me,
I'm gonna need to move fast
with an investigator I can trust, and Cisco--
Yeah, Mickey Haller.
Yes, sir. 2:00 p.m. As in 2:00 p.m. today?
translation.de: Jawohl, Sir. 14 Uhr. Sie meinen, 14 Uhr heute?

translation.en: Yes, sir, I'll be there. Thank you.
translation.de: Jawohl, Sir, ich werde da sein. Danke.

translation.en: Who was that?
[sighs] It's Judge Canter's clerk. It seems Jerry has a trial today.
translation.de: Richter Canters Büro. Jerry hat heute einen Prozess.

translation.en: -What? -Yep.
-Are you gonna eat your sandwich? -No, Lorna, you can have it.
translation.de: -Isst du das Sandwich noch? -Nein, Lorna. Nimm es dir.

translation.en: Thank you. Run.
-I'm covering for Jerry Vincent. -Oh, I heard.
Sorry. What's the name?
And your client's name?
Right.
It's, uh… Letts, first name Izzy.
I think it's a theft.
That would be Marc Daniels,
who I'm covering for, so that's actually mine.
translation.de: den ich vertrete… Das ist mein Fall.

translation.en: -Grand theft, by the by. -Obviously I'm gonna need a continuance.
Obviously I'm not gonna give it to you.
-What? -I got out-of-town witnesses.
I'd rather they be pissed off with the judge or you than me,
translation.de: Sie sollen lieber den Richter oder Sie hassen,

translation.en: especially if I wanna get them back.
[woman] LA-292587. People vs. Izzy Letts.
translation.de: LA-292587. Das Volk gegen Izzy Letts.

translation.en: And we're on.
Sarah Shepard for the People, Judge. Ready for trial.
translation.de: Sarah Shepard vertritt das Volk, Richter. Bereit.

translation.en: Mickey Haller for the defendant, Your Honor.
I'll be with you in one second. May I approach?
translation.de: Ich bin gleich so weit. Darf ich?

translation.en: Your Honor, Mr. Vincent unexpectedly passed yesterday.
translation.de: Euer Ehren, Mr. Vincent verstarb unerwartet.

translation.en: I'm filing in.
My sincere condolences. When will you be ready?
translation.de: Mein Beileid. Wann wären Sie so weit?

translation.en: -Well… -[Wallace] Don't be greedy.
It's a bench trial with two witnesses.
[Sarah] Out-of-town witnesses, who I'll lose with a continuance.
translation.de: Von außerhalb, die ich bei Vertagung verliere.

translation.en: How's tomorrow?
Tomorrow?
Look at the file.
If you feel like you can't be ready, let me know.
translation.de: Sagen Sie, falls Sie's nicht schaffen.

translation.en: Step back.
This case is continued until tomorrow, 10:00 a.m.
translation.de: Der Prozess ist auf morgen 10 Uhr vertagt.

translation.en: -Wait, what? -Sir?
Your Honor, we flew down here from San Francisco.
translation.de: Euer Ehren, wir kommen aus San Francisco.

translation.en: -This is not fair. -I'm afraid we have an emergency.
translation.de: -Das ist unfair. -Leider ist dies eine Notlage.

translation.en: What about the victims? We had an emergency.
translation.de: Und die Opfer? Wir hatten die Notlage.

translation.en: My wife was attacked, for God's sake.
She had her necklace violently snatched off her person.
translation.de: Ihre Kette wurde ihr brutal vom Hals gerissen.

translation.en: [Wallace] And the court is sympathetic, but it's unavoidable.
translation.de: Das Gericht hat Verständnis, doch es geht nicht anders.

translation.en: This case is pushed over until tomorrow at 10:00 a.m.
translation.de: Dieser Fall wird auf morgen 10 Uhr vertagt.

translation.en: Victims have no rights in this process.
-Yeah. Excuse me. -That's what she stole?
At least your client has taste.
-Mickey Haller. I'm your attorney. -Where's Jerry?
Why don't we go someplace we can talk?
translation.de: Reden wir an einem ruhigen Ort.

translation.en: [Izzy] He was such a nice man.
He wasn't even charging me.
At least, not yet.
Why would somebody kill him?
translation.de: Wieso würde man ihn töten wollen?

translation.en: I don't know. The police are still gathering evidence.
translation.de: Keine Ahnung. Die Polizei sammelt Beweise.

translation.en: What kind of world is this?
translation.de: Was ist das für eine Welt?

translation.en: I got to be ready on your case by tomorrow.
translation.de: Ich muss Ihren Fall bis morgen aufarbeiten.

translation.en: -So anything-- -I did not attack her.
I snatched the necklace and ran. I did not attack her.
translation.de: Ich schnappte mir die Kette und floh. Ich griff nicht an.

translation.en: Okay. And is there a reason Jerry didn't try to plead this?
translation.de: Ok, und wieso plädierte Jerry nicht auf schuldig?

translation.en: 'Cause they wanted two years. And Jerry said it was excessive.
translation.de: Sie wollten zwei Jahre Haft. Jerry fand das übertrieben.

translation.en: He thought with a trial, I could at least impress the judge
translation.de: Vor Gericht könnte der Richter wenigstens

translation.en: with my extenuating circumstances.
Which are?
I'm a good person. Who had a drug problem.
translation.de: Ich bin ein guter Mensch. Und ich hatte Drogenprobleme.

translation.en: It wasn't me who stole that necklace,
translation.de: Das war nicht ich, die stahl.

translation.en: so much as somebody I don't even recognize.
translation.de: Ich erkenne diese Person kaum wieder.

translation.en: Somebody who's gone.
I went through rehab.
I'm in recovery.
I believe you.
But I don't know if that other person's ever really gone.
translation.de: Aber vielleicht ist die andere Person noch da.

translation.en: Mine was oxy.
You?
Same, basically.
Which I switched to when I couldn't afford the oxy anymore.
translation.de: Das nahm ich, als mir für Oxy das Geld ausging.

translation.en: So, Jerry planned to put you up there?
And introduce my good personhood status into evidence.
translation.de: Ich sollte zeigen, dass ich mich gewandelt habe.

translation.en: [Lorna] The trial is tomorrow, you say?
Bench trial, two witnesses. I think I'm good.
translation.de: Keine Jury, zwei Zeugen. Schaffe ich.

translation.en: Call Marvin Beedleman, tell him I need a favor.
translation.de: Sag Marvin Beedleman, ich brauche ihn.

translation.en: He's pushing 80, you might have to remind him he owes me.
translation.de: Er wird 80, erinnere ihn daran, dass er mir was schuldet.

translation.en: Got anything on Trevor Elliott?
Jerry took a retainer of $625,000, most of which seems to be gone.
translation.de: Jerry bekam 625.000 $ Vorschuss. Das meiste davon ist weg.

translation.en: He's due another 450 at trial. Non-refundable.
translation.de: Bei Verhandlung werden 450.000 fällig, nicht rückzahlbar.

translation.en: -Wow. -I know. It's like a year's worth of DUIs.
translation.de: Ich weiß. Entspricht einem Jahr Verkehrsdelikte.

translation.en: It's a franchise case.
-Who's the judge? -James P. Stanton.
He's an ex-defense attorney, so that's good. Are you almost there?
translation.de: Ein ehemaliger Verteidiger, also gut. Bist du bald da?

translation.en: -Your appointment's at 3:00. -I'm pulling up.
Do we know for sure Elliott hasn't already hired another lawyer?
translation.de: Wissen wir, dass Elliott keinen neuen Anwalt hat?

translation.en: Don't worry about any other lawyer. Just go.
translation.de: Kümmere dich nicht um andere Anwälte. Los.

translation.en: All right.
Your name?
Nice car, man.
Thanks.
-Thank you. -[valet] I got it.
Go right up. He's waiting for you.
Sure you don't need anything? Water…
I'm fine. Thank you.
Mr. Elliott's in his office?
His office? [chuckles] No.
[Mickey] Mr. Elliott.
Mickey Haller. How you doing?
[Trevor] I stand trial for murder next week.
My attorney's just been shot dead.
You can probably imagine how I might be doing.
translation.de: Sie können sich denken, wie's mir geht.

translation.en: Do they know anything? Any suspects?
Not to my knowledge, no.
I'm told they wanna interview all of his clients.
translation.de: Man will all seine Mandanten verhören.

translation.en: Obviously, I wouldn't advise you talk to them
while this other matter is pending.
What, are they gonna charge me with killing Jerry too?
translation.de: Was? Hängen sie mir das auch an?

translation.en: Why not? It's open fucking season.
So, who are you? How come I've never heard of you?
translation.de: Wer sind Sie? Wieso kenne ich Sie nicht?

translation.en: You've never heard of me
because I make it a practice not to be heard of.
translation.de: dass ich mich gern bedeckt halte.

translation.en: Celebrity lawyers bring too much attention to their clients.
translation.de: Staranwälte lenken die Aufmerksamkeit auf die Mandanten.

translation.en: I don't operate that way.
Now as my case manager explained, Jerry transferred his practice to me.
translation.de: Wie meine Kollegin bereits sagte: Jerry übertrug mir seine Kanzlei.

translation.en: If you look at the contract of representation you signed with him,
you'll see it allowed Jerry to discuss your case with me.
translation.de: dass Jerry sich mit mir beraten durfte.

translation.en: Did he? Discuss it with you?
translation.de: Hat er sich mit Ihnen beraten?

translation.en: No. The point I'm making, Jerry trusted me.
translation.de: Nein. Aber Jerry hat mir vertraut.

translation.en: It doesn't mean I have to.
No, it does not.
-It's Mickey, is it? -That's right.
You play any basketball, Mickey?
-A little bit. -[Trevor] I don't.
Not really.
I love to watch though.
But it always drove me crazy
seeing great players struggle with free throws.
translation.de: wenn tolle Spieler bei Freiwürfen versagen.

translation.en: It's the one thing you can control. Every shot, exactly the same.
translation.de: Nur die kann man kontrollieren. Jeder Wurf ist genau derselbe.

translation.en: Take your time, line it up.
translation.de: Man nimmt sich Zeit. Positioniert sich.

translation.en: And yet, time and chance happen to them all.
translation.de: Doch alles liegt an Zeit und Glück.

translation.en: I don't mean to be an asshole.
Or maybe I do. We were set to go to trial next week.
translation.de: Vielleicht doch. Nächste Woche soll der Prozess losgehen.

translation.en: I've been waiting five months to clear my name.
-I understand. -Do you?
You understand what it's like for an innocent man
translation.de: Wissen Sie, wie es für einen Unschuldigen ist,

translation.en: to have to wait and wait to have his day in court?
translation.de: Ewigkeiten auf den Tag im Gericht zu warten?

translation.en: To have to read all the lies and the bullshit in the media,
translation.de: All die Lügen und den Mist in den Medien zu lesen

translation.en: to have to wear a fucking ankle bracelet 24/7.
translation.de: und ununterbrochen eine Fußfessel zu tragen?

translation.en: -You understand all of that? -I've dealt with clients wrongly accused.
Do not handle me.
Okay. I'll get right to the punchline then.
translation.de: Ok, dann komme ich direkt zum Punkt.

translation.en: Jerry Vincent was an excellent attorney.
-I'm better. -So you say.
-So would say Jerry. -Maybe. If he were here, which he is not.
translation.de: -Und Jerry. -Vielleicht. Aber er ist nicht hier.

translation.en: -I get your frustration. -I asked you not to handle me.
translation.de: -Ich verstehe den Frust. -Ich sagte, kein Anbiedern.

translation.en: Before I consider you, I need to know you'd be ready next week,
translation.de: Ich ziehe Sie in Betracht, wenn Sie nächste Woche parat stehen.

translation.en: 'cause I am not pushing this.
Not for another week. Not for another fucking day.
translation.de: Nicht eine Woche. Nicht mal einen Scheißtag.

translation.en: -I could be ready. -You're up to speed on the case?
translation.de: -Schaffe ich. -Sind Sie mit dem Fall vertraut?

translation.en: I will be. If I'm not prepared, I'll tell you.
But I'm confident you won't have to delay the trial.
translation.de: Ich denke, Sie werden nicht vertagen müssen.

translation.en: You're confident you have to tell me that to get the job.
translation.de: Nein, Sie sagen das, um den Job zu kriegen.

translation.en: All right.
I need to think about this.
That's a good idea. Have me checked out.
Take your time. Not too much.
translation.de: Nehmen Sie sich Zeit. Aber nicht zu viel.

translation.en: The longer you wait,
the greater the chance the judge will push your trial back.
translation.de: desto wahrscheinlicher wird der Prozess verschoben.

translation.en: If you go with me, I'll make sure that won't happen.
translation.de: Geben Sie mir das Mandat, und ich verhindere das.

translation.en: Your sales skills are admirable, I'll give you that.
translation.de: Gute Sales-Strategie, das muss ich Ihnen lassen.

translation.en: Criminal defense is what I do, Mr. Elliott.
I do it very well. You have my numbers.
translation.de: Ich kann das gut. Melden Sie sich.

translation.en: I've lost everything, you understand that, Mickey?
translation.de: Ich habe alles verloren, verstehen Sie, Mickey?

translation.en: My life, my reputation…
worst of all, my wife.
Who I very much did love.
I get it.
You get nothing. Not yet.
translation.de: Sie verstehen gar nichts. Noch nicht.

translation.en: You think you just hit the lottery, but I'm telling you… not yet.
translation.de: Sie denken, das ist wie ein Lottogewinn. Aber ich sage Ihnen… noch nicht.

translation.en: [Lorna over phone] Next week? That is impossible.
translation.de: Nächste Woche? Das geht nicht, Mickey.

translation.en: [Mickey] It was a deal-breaker.
translation.de: Aber darauf kam es ihm an.

translation.en: First, let's land him,
then maybe I can talk him into a continuance.
That has to go.
-What? -Nothing.
translation.de: HÄTTE ICH MEIN MAUL GEHALTEN, WÄRE ICH NICHT HIER -Was? -Nichts.

translation.en: I'm gonna need a driver.
I need this time to be going over files.
translation.de: Ich brauche die Zeit zum Arbeiten.

translation.en: I was thinking maybe Quintero. Is he around?
translation.de: Wie wäre es mit Quintero? Gibt's den noch?

translation.en: Still doing time in Corcoran, I heard.
translation.de: Der sitzt noch ein in Corcoran.

translation.en: Well, what about Stevie?
Stevie is a terrible driver. Nobody's getting in the car with him.
translation.de: Der kann nicht fahren. Bei dem steigt niemand ein.

translation.en: All right. Put the word out, will ya?
translation.de: Ok. Hör dich mal um, ja?

translation.en: I'm pulling in. See you in a second.
Jesus. You scared the shit out of me, Cisco.
translation.de: Herrgott, hast du mich erschreckt, Cisco.

translation.en: What the hell are you even doing here, man?
translation.de: Was willst du denn hier, Mann?

translation.en: Lorna said you wanted to hire me.
Not for this, Cisco. To work on the Trevor Elliott case.
translation.de: Nicht hierfür, Cisco. Für den Trevor-Elliott-Fall.

translation.en: The police'll handle who killed Jerry Vincent.
You're giving me a heart attack, man.
You could have given me one.
So, Trevor Elliott, huh? That's a big get.
translation.de: Also… Trevor Elliott. Ein großer Fang.

translation.en: Yeah, if I get him.
I haven't nailed down the gig.
I need to be able to tell him something good.
Something to make him wanna hire me.
Have you seen the file?
Some. Two dead people. He was at the scene. Not exactly stellar.
translation.de: Ein bisschen. Zwei Tote. Er war am Tatort. Sieht nicht so toll aus.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I gotta offer "stellar" somehow.
Maybe Maggie can give us some inside baseball on the State's case.
translation.de: Vielleicht sagt uns Maggie, was die Anklage weiß.

translation.en: Oh, shit. Maggie.
[Maggie] Damn it.
You can go, Mom. I'll be fine till he gets here.
translation.de: Geh, Mom. Ich komme klar, bis er kommt.

translation.en: I'm not going.
Think I'm okay to be by myself for a half-hour.
translation.de: Ich komme wohl eine halbe Stunde klar.

translation.en: The world hasn't gotten that dangerous.
translation.de: So gefährlich ist die Welt nicht.

translation.en: -Not happening. -I'm hoping to have a nice time tonight.
translation.de: -Vergiss es. -Ich will einen netten Abend haben.

translation.en: My chances are better if Dad's in a good mood,
translation.de: Den habe ich, wenn Dad gute Laune hat,

translation.en: and the chances of that are better
if you don't rip him a new one for being 15 minutes late.
translation.de: wenn du ihn nicht wegen 15 Minuten fertigmachst.

translation.en: There he is.
-[Mickey] I'm sorry. -[Maggie] Really?
Sorry.
-You look good. Sorry. -You gave me your word. 6:00 p.m.
translation.de: -Siehst gut aus. Sorry. -Du hast 18 Uhr versprochen.

translation.en: [Mickey] I know.
You really wanna get back to joint custody? Step one--
translation.de: Du willst gemeinsames Sorgerecht? Schritt eins…

translation.en: Maggie, I'm here now.
How about we deal with you and me later, all right?
translation.de: Lass uns das später untereinander klären.

translation.en: -[Maggie] I'll pick you up in the morning. -Okay.
-I love you. -Love you, too.
If you're gonna treat me like shit,
have the decency to not look so amazing while doing it.
translation.de: sieh dabei wenigstens nicht so großartig aus.

translation.en: [Hayley] Hello.
-How are you, baby? You good? -I'm good.
-Ready? Have your bag? -Yeah.
[Cisco] He had a sense what was coming, Jerry.
I don't know.
Well, he files a motion ten days ago.
translation.de: Nun, vor zehn Tagen stellt er den Antrag,

translation.en: Transfer his practice in case of his death.
translation.de: die Kanzlei im Todesfall zu übertragen.

translation.en: Look, let's just focus on Elliott for now, okay?
translation.de: Legen wir den Fokus zunächst auf Elliott, ok?

translation.en: Mickey's not really serious about trying this case next week, is he?
translation.de: Mickey will doch nicht wirklich nächste Woche vor Gericht?

translation.en: Technically, it's nine days. Okay, I said the same thing,
translation.de: Es sind neun Tage. Und ich habe ihm das auch gesagt.

translation.en: but cases like this don't come around often.
And Mickey needs this. He needs something.
He's okay with… You know?
translation.de: Was sagt er zu… Du weißt schon?

translation.en: -I take it you haven't told him. -I just haven't found the right moment.
translation.de: -Er weiß es noch nicht. -Es gab noch keinen günstigen Moment.

translation.en: [Hayley] So, you didn't actually go in the water?
translation.de: Du warst also nicht im Wasser?

translation.en: No.
You know that nightmare I have?
It's not so much of me almost drowning,
translation.de: Es geht nicht darum, dass ich fast ertrinke.

translation.en: it's of you.
Leaving you behind, that's the part that always gets me.
translation.de: Dass ich dich zurücklasse, wäre das Schlimmste.

translation.en: -Dad… -What?
You had an accident.
You're not the first surfer it's happened to
and I'm not the first kid to have something bad happen to a parent.
translation.de: und viele Kinder haben Eltern, denen etwas zustieß.

translation.en: You are tough. You are tough.
[in English] Don't get quite as tough as her, okay?
translation.de: Werde nicht so stark wie sie, ok?

translation.en: -[chuckles] I'll try not to. -Well, good.
She's worried about you.
She said that?
She thinks it might be some mid-life thing on top of the pills.
translation.de: Sie denkt, zum Tablettenproblem kommt noch eine Midlife-Crisis.

translation.en: Is it?
Well, maybe a little.
What do you mean?
Mija, two failed marriages, busted law practice,
translation.de: Mija, zwei gescheiterte Ehen, eine bankrotte Kanzlei,

translation.en: six months in rehab…
You hit the jackpot with your daughter. Come on…
translation.de: Dafür ist deine Tochter gelungen. Komm schon.

translation.en: Hey. [chuckles]
When I look back, I always wanted to be a defense lawyer,
translation.de: Ich wollte schon immer Strafverteidiger werden,

translation.en: ever since I was a kid watching my dad.
translation.de: schon als ich als Kind meinem Dad zusah.

translation.en: The stuff they teach you in law school, how the system's supposed to work.
translation.de: Man lernt bestimmte Dinge im Studium, wie das System funktionieren soll…

translation.en: You get out there and it's all just muddy.
translation.de: Doch im wahren Leben ist es verworren.

translation.en: Everybody's working an angle.
Everybody lies.
After a while you wonder if you're doing any good at all.
translation.de: Irgendwann fragt man sich, ob man überhaupt was Gutes tut.

translation.en: You know Mom never feels that way, right? She just puts bad people away.
translation.de: Mom fühlt sich nie so. Sie sperrt einfach böse Menschen weg.

translation.en: Your mom's a true believer.
That's what makes her so great at what she does.
translation.de: Deswegen ist sie so gut in ihrem Job.

translation.en: But you're not?
I was. I think I still am.
translation.de: Ich war gut. Und bin es wohl immer noch.

translation.en: Look, I believe that in our system, everyone is innocent until proven guilty.
translation.de: Ich denke, in unserem System muss man die Schuld erst beweisen.

translation.en: Now, when the State points the finger at you,
translation.de: Zeigt der Staat mit dem Finger auf dich,

translation.en: well, I'm all you got.
Now what?
Are you kidding me?
Sorry to intrude.
This better be good, Detective.
It's important.
We really gotta see Jerry Vincent's files.
translation.de: Wir müssen Jerry Vincents Akten dringend einsehen.

translation.en: I realize you have attorney-client privilege.
DA says you probably have the right to shut us down.
Seriously? I knew this guy.
I really need you to see what we're up against.
translation.de: Sie sollen sehen, womit wir's zu tun haben.

translation.en: It's a kill shot to the head, very clean.
translation.de: Es war ein sehr präziser Kopfschuss.

translation.en: Whoever pulled the trigger picked up the shell casings too.
translation.de: Der Schütze hat die Patronenhülsen mitgenommen.

translation.en: Someone targeted Jerry Vincent
and they didn't take his wallet or his cash.
translation.de: es fehlen weder Brieftasche noch Bargeld.

translation.en: They took his bag with his laptop.
translation.de: Man stahl die Tasche, in der sein Laptop war.

translation.en: Now, the question is, what was on there? What did he know that got him killed?
translation.de: Die Frage lautet: Was war da drauf? Was wusste er, dass man ihn tötete?

translation.en: If the answer's any place, it's probably in his files.
translation.de: Die Antwort findet sich womöglich in seinen Akten.

translation.en: I wish I could help you, Detective, I really do.
translation.de: Ich würde Ihnen gern helfen, Detective. Wirklich.

translation.en: I'm asking you to help yourself.
You're at risk, Counselor.
You could be next.
[Cisco] Was Jerry involved with wise guys or cartel guys?
translation.de: Hatte Jerry mit der Mafia oder dem Kartell zu tun?

translation.en: I doubt it, he was straight ahead.
-Ex-prosecutor. -Maybe it's someone he put in prison.
One second.
Yeah, I thought about that. Comb through the files.
translation.de: Habe ich auch überlegt. Geh die Akten durch.

translation.en: Look for any hint of threats, clients, ex-clients, everybody, all right?
translation.de: Such nach Drohungen, Mandanten, Ex-Mandanten, alle, ok?

translation.en: I'm on it.
In the meantime, Elliott gave us access
to his house in Malibu where the murders happened.
translation.de: zu seinem Haus in Malibu, dem Tatort.

translation.en: It's important we get a true picture.
translation.de: Wir müssen uns ein Bild machen.

translation.en: I'll shoot you the address. Let's meet there around noon.
translation.de: Ich schicke die Adresse. Wir treffen uns gegen 12.

translation.en: This means we have the case?
Not yet. The more we learn the better our chances.
translation.de: Noch nicht. Je mehr wir wissen, desto besser.

translation.en: -Where are you right now? -Heading into trial.
-Oh! Mickey! -Thanks for coming. I appreciate this.
Why wouldn't I?
When the greatest person I ever met asks for my help,
translation.de: Wenn der tollste Mensch, den ich kenne, Hilfe braucht,

translation.en: I give my help.
How's Eleanor?
Oh, she's absolutely fantastic is how she is. And she sends her love.
translation.de: Ihr geht es ausgesprochen gut. Sie lässt grüßen.

translation.en: Send my love to her. Thank you. [woman] LA-292587. People vs. Izzy Letts.
translation.de: -Grüßen Sie zurück. Danke. -LA-292587. Das Volk gegen Izzy Letts.

translation.en: Be with you in a second.
Mickey Haller, Judge, asks that we approach?
Please tell me you're ready.
-Almost, Judge. -[Wallace] Mr. Haller.
Actually, Judge.
At the risk of further antagonizing Mr. Holt,
translation.de: Auch wenn es Mr. Holt verärgern könnte,

translation.en: maybe we call him up for the sidebar?
-Excuse me? -What's going on?
A bit unorthodox, but in the best interests
of judicial economy and justice.
Take 30 seconds.
Could you approach the bench?
How you doin'? All right, I'll make this quick.
My client is charged with grand theft.
Which under Section 487 of the Penal Code
means the value of the stolen object exceeds $950.
translation.de: muss der Wert des gestohlenen Objekts 950 Dollar übersteigen.

translation.en: Your Honor, that necklace is worth what, $400, tops?
translation.de: Euer Ehren, diese Kette ist wie viel wert? Maximal 400 Dollar?

translation.en: What?
I've taken few payments in diamonds and gold,
translation.de: Man bezahlte mich mit Diamanten und Gold,

translation.en: developed a pretty good eye.
But to be sure, Judge,
I also brought with me an expert on the matter.
That is Marvin Beedleman. He's a jeweler.
translation.de: Das ist Marvin Beedleman. Ein Juwelier.

translation.en: He can give us a pretty quick appraisal.
translation.de: Er kann es schnell für uns schätzen.

translation.en: The District Attorney might want to get one of her own.
translation.de: Oder die Staatsanwältin will es selbst schätzen lassen.

translation.en: Guessing your wife doesn't know it's a knock-off?
translation.de: Ihre Frau weiß nichts vom Imitat?

translation.en: I, of course, don't want to upset her.
Are you kidding me?
I am not. I am not.
Even if it is a knock-off, the defendant thought she was stealing the real thing.
translation.de: Selbst wenn sie ein Imitat ist: Die Klägerin dachte, sie sei echt.

translation.en: You have a witness to testify as to her state of mind?
Did you not have the necklace appraised?
translation.de: Sie ließen die Kette nicht schätzen?

translation.en: We have the appraisal from his insurance company.
Might open up a whole new can of fraud.
I could be wrong, of course.
Miss Shepard, any thoughts on how you might like to play this?
translation.de: Ms. Shepard, wie wollen Sie jetzt weiter verfahren?

translation.en: Completely dismissed? I get to just go?
translation.de: Klage abgewiesen? Ich darf einfach gehen?

translation.en: Well, unless the DA decides to prosecute the Holts
translation.de: Außer, man will die Holts strafrechtlich verfolgen,

translation.en: and you get called as a witness against them,
translation.de: und Sie sollen gegen sie aussagen,

translation.en: but I don't think that'll happen.
Oh, my God.
Didn't even have to get up there
and testify as to what a nice person you are.
translation.de: und bezeugen, wie nett Sie sind.

translation.en: [chuckles] I don't know how to thank you. I will pay you one day, I promise.
translation.de: Wie soll ich Ihnen danken? Ich bezahle Sie noch. Versprochen.

translation.en: You pay me now.
I'm broke. I don't have a nickel to my name.
translation.de: Ich bin pleite. Ich habe nichts.

translation.en: Have a driver's license?
Excuse me?
[Lorna] What do you mean you hired her?
I told you I needed a driver, and she can drive.
translation.de: Ich brauchte jemanden, der mich fährt. Das kann sie.

translation.en: I'm actually a good driver.
She's actually a good driver, Lorna.
translation.de: Sie kann sehr gut fahren, Lorna.

translation.en: [Lorna] It wouldn't kill you to work from an office.
translation.de: Ein Büro würde dich nicht umbringen. Zu strukturiert.

translation.en: Too much structure. I gotta work while I'm on the move.
translation.de: Zu strukturiert. Ich arbeite in Bewegung.

translation.en: -Didn't you say she's an addict? -Former. Who am I to judge? Turn right.
translation.de: -Ist sie nicht ein Junkie? -Ex. Ich sollte nicht urteilen. Rechts.

translation.en: I'm almost there. Call you back.
translation.de: Bin fast da. Ich rufe zurück.

translation.en: Mickey, no-- [groans]
-Maggie. -Hi, Lorna. Nice to see you.
Um, thank you, and likewise. You look pretty.
translation.de: Danke. Mich auch. Hübsch siehst du aus.

translation.en: Something I can help you with?
We both care for him, Lorna.
translation.de: Er ist uns beiden wichtig, Lorna.

translation.en: And I mean, I'm happy
for all this positive turn of events for Mickey…
translation.de: dass es für Mickey wieder besser aussieht…

translation.en: But?
But taking over a high-profile murder for a lawyer who was just gunned down
translation.de: Aber einen Mordprozess von einem ermordeten Anwalt zu übernehmen,

translation.en: for God knows what reason, do we really think this is a good idea?
translation.de: wobei das Motiv unklar ist… Ist das eine so gute Idee?

translation.en: The wolf is at the door, Maggie.
I have been holding his practice together with string and glue.
translation.de: Ich halte mit Mühe und Not die Kanzlei am Laufen.

translation.en: His life is bigger than just his law career.
translation.de: Zu seinem Leben gehört mehr als sein Beruf.

translation.en: He needs to get back on his feet first. His daughter needs him back on his feet.
translation.de: Er muss erst wieder auf die Beine kommen. Für seine Tochter.

translation.en: I know, and this could be the thing that gets him there.
translation.de: Ich weiß. Und damit könnte das gelingen.

translation.en: For the first time in a year, he's alive again.
translation.de: Das erste Mal seit einem Jahr blüht er auf.

translation.en: And you know Mickey.
The only thing he likes more than a fight
translation.de: Er liebt nur eines mehr als kämpfen:

translation.en: is a fight with one hand tied behind his back.
[Mickey] I'll be about 15 minutes.
[Izzy] Sounds good.
Welcome to the jungle.
Remind me. We're never bringing the jury here.
translation.de: Die Jury darf das hier nie sehen.

translation.en: They'll hate this guy and we're doomed.
translation.de: Dann hassen sie ihn, und das war's.

translation.en: [Cisco] Wife was there on the bed.
translation.de: Die Frau lag auf dem Bett.

translation.en: Boyfriend there on the floor.
Police think Elliott stood at the door. Maybe watching them fuck--
translation.de: Die Polizei denkt, Elliott stand in der Tür und sah ihnen beim Ficken…

translation.en: Fornicate for a while before he came in and shot 'em.
translation.de: Geschlechtsverkehr zu, ehe er reinkam und sie erschoss.

translation.en: [Mickey] Murder weapon was never found.
Probably out there in the ocean.
I don't know, Mick. You're good, but this good?
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, Mick. Du bist gut. Aber reicht das?

translation.en: If they could place Elliott here.
Motive all over. Positive gunshot residue.
Has he given you his story?
Hey, listen, there's something else.
What?
I know you're okay with me seeing Lorna and shit.
translation.de: Es ist ok für dich, dass ich mit Lorna zusammen bin.

translation.en: At least you say you're okay with it.
Lorna's been meaning to tell you when the time is right,
translation.de: Sie wollte auf den richtigen Zeitpunkt warten,

translation.en: but somehow,
I suspect the time might never be right for her,
translation.de: der richtige Zeitpunkt kommt für sie wohl nie,

translation.en: so I'm just gonna say it.
Me and Lorna,
we're gonna get married.
What do you mean, "Ah"? What is "Ah"? Is it okay with you?
translation.de: Was meinst du damit? Was heißt das? Ist es ok für dich?

translation.en: I'm not part of the equation, Cisco.
But I wanna know, is it okay with you?
translation.de: Ich will wissen, ob es ok ist.

translation.en: Do you love her?
With all my heart.
Then it's all right with me.
translation.de: Dann ist es ok für mich.

translation.en: But I'll tell you, Cisco.
She's one of the four most important people in my life.
translation.de: Sie ist einer der vier wichtigsten Menschen für mich.

translation.en: -Should you ever hurt her-- -Of course I would never.
translation.de: -Wenn du ihr je wehtust… -Würde ich nie.

translation.en: She's the greatest thing ever.
Who's the fourth?
What?
You said four people.
Hayley, Maggie, Lorna and--
Who's the fourth?
Yes, uh… Yes, I'll be there.
Trevor Elliott has summoned me.
[Trevor] You checked out well.
High-performing trial lawyer, much better than Jerry according to most.
translation.de: Exzellenter Prozessanwalt, angeblich viel besser als Jerry.

translation.en: Until you went off the deep end and became a drug addict.
translation.de: Bis Sie durchknallten und tablettenabhängig wurden.

translation.en: I'm not an addict now.
Listen, Mickey. The thing about this case,
I need to win it in court
and I need to win in the court of public opinion.
translation.de: und auch die öffentliche Meinung überzeugen.

translation.en: The world is quick to cancel these days.
Just take a look at my Twitter feed.
translation.de: Sehen Sie sich meinen Twitterfeed an.

translation.en: I need a lawyer who can get me my freedom back
translation.de: Mein Anwalt soll für mich Freiheit

translation.en: and my name back.
Are you that lawyer?
No.
No, all I can do is get you a "Not guilty."
translation.de: Sie kriegen von mir ein "Nicht schuldig."

translation.en: I can't deliver you a finding of innocent.
The courts don't work that way. Not guilty, best I can do.
translation.de: So läuft's vor Gericht nicht. Nicht schuldig ginge.

translation.en: And you can get that? For sure?
Depends on what I have to work with.
translation.de: Kommt drauf an, womit ich es zu tun habe.

translation.en: -I didn't kill them. -I didn't ask you.
But I need you to know, I didn't.
All right, here's the deal, Trevor.
I can win almost any case as long as I know what I'm dealing with.
translation.de: Ich gewinne fast jeden Fall, wenn ich weiß, womit ich es zu tun habe.

translation.en: Right now, I don't.
So you lie to me,
I don't want your case, however much I might need it.
translation.de: will ich den Fall nicht, auch wenn ich ihn brauche.

translation.en: Okay.
Okay.
I was as far from cool as you can get in high school.
translation.de: Auf der Highschool war ich extrem uncool.

translation.en: Girls wouldn't give me the time of day, but I could always talk to Zelda.
translation.de: Die Mädchen ignorierten mich, aber ich hatte immerhin Zelda.

translation.en: Real life sucked.
But video games, they mattered.
Then I met Lara.
She was different. She was beautiful, she was brilliant.
translation.de: Sie war anders. Sie war schön, sie war brillant…

translation.en: And she loved me.
We're just out of grad school, the game industry was exploding.
translation.de: Kurz nach unserem Abschluss boomte die Gaming-Branche.

translation.en: But the problem that nobody could get around was the uncanny valley.
translation.de: Doch niemand konnte das Uncanny-Valley-Problem lösen.

translation.en: Uncanny what?
If you're trying to make something humanlike,
the human brain will reject it unless it's almost perfect.
translation.de: lehnt das Gehirn ab, wenn sie nicht fast perfekt sind.

translation.en: You know, video game characters were close to real,
but not close enough.
Especially in the eyes, the eyes always gave it away.
translation.de: Besonders an den Augen merkt man es.

translation.en: But the closer the characters resemble us,
translation.de: Je mehr uns die Figuren ähneln,

translation.en: the more connection we feel, the more we wanna play.
translation.de: desto größer sind Identifikation und Spieldrang.

translation.en: That's the uncanny valley. And I was the one who crossed it.
translation.de: Das nennt man Akzeptanzlücke. Und ich habe sie geschlossen.

translation.en: Working out of my garage.
One script, maybe 100 lines of code,
translation.de: Ein Skript mit etwa 100 Zeilen Code

translation.en: changed everything.
The girl in the game.
That was our first big hit.
It's what put us on the map.
And, yes, I modeled the character after Lara.
translation.de: Und ja, die Inspiration zur Figur war Lara.

translation.en: It's fair to say that her DNA
is in everything this company has ever done.
translation.de: mit allem, was diese Firma je geschaffen hat.

translation.en: We were a team.
I didn't know she was cheating on me.
translation.de: Ich wusste nichts von der Affäre.

translation.en: Looking back at it, I was working all the time,
translation.de: Ich habe die ganze Zeit gearbeitet,

translation.en: I was traveling too much, and she grew resentful.
translation.de: war zu viel unterwegs, und sie wurde sauer.

translation.en: Angry.
I went out to the house that day to surprise her.
translation.de: Ich wollte sie an jenem Tag überraschen.

translation.en: And instead…
I will never get that out of my head as long as I live.
translation.de: Ich werde das mein Lebtag nicht mehr vergessen.

translation.en: I found her like that. My own wife. My best friend.
translation.de: Ich habe sie so aufgefunden. Meine eigene Frau. Meine beste Freundin.

translation.en: And that fucking yoga instructor.
And everyone thinks I killed her,
but the truth is if I had found them alive,
translation.de: aber hätte ich sie lebend erwischt,

translation.en: I wouldn't even have left her.
translation.de: hätte ich sie nicht mal verlassen.

translation.en: I would have begged her to come back to me because I need her.
translation.de: Ich hätte sie angefleht zu bleiben, da ich sie brauche.

translation.en: People say I'm a genius. The code I wrote, they call it magic.
translation.de: Man nennt mich Genie. Mein Code, so sagt man, sei Zauberei.

translation.en: Lara was the magic. She was the inspiration.
translation.de: Lara war dieser Zauber. Sie war die Inspiration.

translation.en: Without her, I would still be sitting in my garage.
translation.de: Ohne sie würde ich noch immer in meiner Garage hocken.

translation.en: I never could have killed her
because without her…
I have no magic.
That's what you're dealing with. Can you work with that?
translation.de: So sieht es aus. Können Sie damit arbeiten?

translation.en: I can win with that.
-You can win with that? -I can.
-You can win with that next week? -I can.
Then you're hired.
-[Lorna] Well? -We got it.
-We got the case? -Lots of work to do, Lorna.
translation.de: -Wir haben ihn? -Wir haben viel zu tun.

translation.en: -We need to keep our heads. -Oh, my God.
Lots of work. Tell Cisco to meet me at the office.
translation.de: Viel zu tun. Cisco soll mich in der Kanzlei treffen.

translation.en: See you in a few.
You okay?
Your eyes look like they're about to cry.
translation.de: Es scheint, als weinen Sie gleich.

translation.en: Uh, just allergies.
Your eyes should be on the road, by the way.
You really okay?
Never been better. Take the turn up here, will you?
translation.de: Ging nie besser. Bitte hier abbiegen.

translation.en: What? Is something wrong?
Yeah, we're being followed.
